alert.note: Alert for Buchanan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 10:36PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Buchanan, northwestern McDowell and southwestern Wyoming Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1035 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grundy, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Welch, Grundy, Davy, Bradshaw, Iaeger, Kimball, Stacy, Vansant, Coalwood, Avondale, Jolo and Roseann. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
